extends java.lang.Object

      • compressImageToMax

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap compressImageToMax(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                                                         int maxBytes)
        Compress an image as much as possible until the size in bytes is no more than the specified amount
        Parameters:
        image - the image to compress
        maxBytes - the maximum size of the image in bytes
        Returns:
        the compressed image if it was possible to get it to that size, or null otherwise
